src:
PSSI Dipimpin Komjen Iriawan, Polri: Akan Makin Berprestasi
03 Nov 2019, 06:25 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Komjen Mochamad Iriawan atau yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule resmi terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI. Polri yakin bidang sepak bola tanah air akan semakin maju di bawah kepepimpinan mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya itu.
"Selamat atas terpilihnya Komjen Iwan sebagai Ketua PSSI, yang terpilih melalui mekanisme dan aturan yang berlaku. Semoga ke depan, di bawah kepemimpinan beliau, PSSI akan semakin berprestasi di kancah persepakbolaan internasional," kata Karo Penmas Divisi Humas Polri Brigjen Dedi Prasetyo, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Hal itu disampaikan Dedi saat detikcom meminta tanggapan Polri terkait terpilihnya M Iriawan sebagai Ketum PSSI yang baru. Untuk diketahui, M Iriawan hingga kini masih berstatus anggota Polri aktif.
"PSSI sebagai salah satu induk organisasi olahraga dapat diketuai oleh siapa saja warga negara Indonesia, sesuai dengan persyaratan dan ketentuan yang berlaku," ujar Dedi.

text:
PSSI Led by Komjen Iriawan, Polri: Will Have More Achievements
03 Nov 2019, 06:25 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Komjen Mochamad Iriawan, or who is familiarly called Iwan Bule, was officially elected as PSSI General Chairperson. The National Police believes that the soccer field in the country will progress further under the leadership of the former Metro Jaya Police Chief.
"Congratulations on the election of Komjen Iwan as Chair of PSSI, who was elected through mechanisms and regulations. Hopefully in the future, under his leadership, PSSI will increasingly excel in the arena of international football," Karo Penmas the National Police Public Relations Division Brigadier Dedi Prasetyo said Saturday (Saturday) 11/2/2019).
That was said by Dedi when detikcom asked the National Police response related to the election of M Iriawan as the new Chairman of the PSSI. For information, M Iriawan is still an active Polri member.
"PSSI as one of the parent sports organizations can be chaired by any Indonesian citizen, in accordance with applicable terms and conditions," said Dedi.
